title: DOM levels
content:
The Dom Levels indicator allows to display data changes in the DOM. The indicator works only online and starts building markers from the moment you have added it on the chart. The minimum/maximum volume, basic ask/bid colors, and colors of bids, and asks which are higher than the maximum volumes set in the indicator. If the limit level volume in the DOM is higher than the minimum, but lower than the maximum volume, the price level is colored proportionally to the volume. If the limit level volume in the DOM is higher than the maximum volume, the price level is colored with the color of the maximum volumes.
It is better to use this indicator in a tick chart with a value = 1, where each bar (tick) consists of a separate aggregated trade, or in the Cumulative Trades chart with a possibility to set your own volume filter values.
Besides, when hovering over the indicator marker, it is possible to see data values in the DOM at a particular level at a certain moment.

To add and set up the indicator, open the Indicators settings window.

Upper cut-off, % The parameter sets the upper limit for the maximum volume, determining the colors used to represent it. For example, if a 5% cutoff is selected, the platform will assign the maximum color to the top 5% of volumes. This feature works with the Delta, Volume Proportion, and Trades Proportion color schemes.
Contrast Determines the contrast ratio for a given element.
Smoothing mode Defines one of the available smoothing modes.

Options:
  • Auto
  • Manual
  • None
Smoothing Determines the smoothing ratio for a given element.
Log scale If enabled, determines the size of the logarithmic scale for determining the contrast of price levels.
Use transparency This setting allows users to customize transparency of the visual objects on the chart.
Custom proportion Defines the maximum volume size for determining the proportionality factor.
Extend depth lines Determines whether to extend lines.
Show last limits The setting controls the display of order book levels that have become unavailable due to the removal of the price associated with them.

Visual Settings

NameDescription
Auto text color

Min. volume filter

NameDescription
Filter Depth levels with less volume will be ignored

Max. volume filter

NameDescription

Color Defines the color for elements that do not pass the maximum volume filter.

Best Bid/Ask

NameDescription
Best bid line Specifies settings for the color, style, and width of the displayed lines.
Best ask line Specifies settings for the color, style, and width of the displayed lines.

History

NameDescription
Days to save Defines the number of days to save data.
Bars limit Defines the maximum number of bars for calculation.

Bid Alert

NameDescription
Filter Sets the value at which the alert is triggered.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.
Font Color Sets the color of the text in the alert window.
Background Sets the background color of the alert window.

Ask Alert

NameDescription
Filter Sets the value at which the alert is triggered.
Alert File This parameter allows users to specify the name of a custom audio file for alert sounds. Users can select a WAV file that will be played whenever an alert condition is triggered. The chosen WAV file should be located in the folder C:\Program Files (x86)\ATAS Platform\Sounds.
Font Color Sets the color of the text in the alert window.
Background Sets the background color of the alert window.

The zoom function (activated by holding down the Ctrl key and hovering over the colored area of the indicator) shows the values that were in the DOM at the moment the candle closed.

The value under the cursor will be centered on the tile that appears.
